name: frameworks-performance
description: Gather performans metrics from apps written in different frameworks.

scripts.test: npm run test:app:node && npm run test:app:node-express && npm run test:app:node-nest
scripts.test:app:node: npm run start:node && npm run test:ab && npm run stop:node
scripts.test:app:node-express: npm run start:node-express && npm run test:ab && npm run stop:node-express
scripts.test:app:node-nest: npm run start:node-nest && npm run test:ab && npm run stop:node-nest
scripts.stop:apps: npm run stop:node && npm run stop:node-express && npm run stop:node-nest
